INFO REQUEST

OVERVIEW

CMO Public Company Limited is aware the important of “Sustainable”
and appropriate riskmanagement with the aim of creating a balance in three aspects,
namely economy, society andenvironment, for maximum benefit of
all stakeholdersand in alignment with the United Nations
Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).

Therefore, the Company has set the policies of sustainability management 7 issues
for the guideline with the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) of
the United Nations that covered three aspects, namely economy,
society and environment as follows:
